text: Zubaida Gulshan Ara ( – 19 March 2017) was a Bangladeshi writer. She was the chairperson of Bangladesh Shishu Academy. She was awarded Ekushey Padak in 2005 by the Government of Bangladesh. ==Career== Ara wrote 50 books. She served as the general secretary of "Sahitto Bangladesh", a literary organization. ==References== Category:1940s births Category:2017 deaths Category:Bangladeshi women writers Category:Recipients of the Ekushey Padak Category:Year of birth missing Category:Burials at Banani Graveyard
title: Zubaida Gulshan Ara
